name: ampache
description: Ampache is a self-hosted web-based music streaming server. It allows users to stream, browse, and share music and videos from any web browser or compatible client. It supports multi-user access, playlists, and API integrations.
features: Music Streaming: Stream your entire music library from any web browser. Your music, anywhere.
Video Support: Play videos alongside your music collection. Complete media server.
Multi-User: Create accounts for family and friends with individual preferences. Share your library safely.
Playlist Management: Create, edit, and share playlists across devices. Organize your listening.
API Integration: Connect with mobile apps and third-party clients. Extend functionality.
Smart Search: Find songs, albums, and artists instantly with powerful search. Discover your collection.
Transcoding: Automatic format conversion for device compatibility. Play anywhere, any format.
Web Interface: Clean, responsive design works on all devices. Beautiful music experience.
